abstract: JPMorgan Chase plans to sell $6 billion in noncumulative perpetual preferred shares, according to a report in International Financing Review, a Thomson publication.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase plans to sell $6 billion in noncumulative perpetual preferred shares, according to a report in International Financing Review, a Thomson publication.

headline.main: JPMorgan to Sell $6 Billion of Preferred Shares, Report Says
